name: The Grid (itch) (JeffCube)
description:
• Programming / Game Design: JeffCube
  • Sprites: Jeffcube
  • Music:
    • Epic Song by BoxCat Games | https://freemusicarchive.org/music/BoxCat_Games
      Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/ Creative Commons CC BY 3.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
  • Sound Effects: 
    • Kenny.nl
    • JFXR

Instructions: 

You are a factory manager and it is your job to keep the emergency light bulb on at all times. Unfortunately the power has been varying drastically so you must turn on other bulbs when the power is high to keep the emergency bulb from overloading. Be careful. If you spread the power too thinly the emergency bulb will turn off! Mind the time. Each level lasts for 24 hours: 12AM - 12PM.

NOTE:

Unfortunately this game has no sound due to a build error. I tried everything to fix it but I think it is due to how the audio system has been setup for this project.
